required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Dilapan-S Osmotic Dilator in Pre-induction of Labor
clinical_study.official_title: Prospective Collection of Data About the Use of the Dilapan-S Osmotic Dilator in Pre-induction of Labor in Women With/Without Caesarean Section in Their History

brief_summary.textblock: Non-interventional prospective data collection designed to evaluate clinical outcome on the efficacy of the use of Dilapan-S in the indication of labor pre-induction in women with/without a history of Caesarean section. The evaluation will be based on prospective data collection in at least four obstetrics centers in the Czech Republic.

detailed_description.textblock: Nowadays there is a rising need for non-pharmacological cervical ripening methods as the use of prostaglandins is frequently limited by various contraindications. Dilapan-S is a hygroscopic uterine neck dilator. Its mode of action consists in the hydrophilic properties of the device absorbing fluids from surrounding tissue structures, thus expanding the volume of Dilapan-S sticks which subsequently exert radial pressure on the surrounding structures (uterine neck) to dilate progressively. Endocervical pressure on the uterine neck results not only in its mechanical dilatation but pressure on endocervical structures also stimulates the production of endogenous prostaglandins, which promote cervical ripening through its collagenolytic action. Although Dilapan-S is widely used in labor pre-induction, published study data comparing its clinical efficacy and safety in females with/without caesarean section in medical history are lacking.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Before pre-induction of labor performance and up to 24 h after pre-induction of labor
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate, based on the value obtained in the Cervix Score, the efficacy of use of the Dilapan-S device in the indication labor pre-induction, and to compare outcomes in patients with/without a history of Caesarean section.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Dilapan-S rods insertion up to 24 hours
secondary_outcome.description: To compare these outcomes in patients with and without a history of Caesarean section.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the moment of Dilapan-S insertion up to 24 hours until their removal
secondary_outcome.description: Expected the insertion from 2 to 5 Dilapan-S rods. To compare these results in patients with/without Cesarean section in their medical history.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Dilapan-S rods insertion up to 24 h during pre-induction of labor phase
secondary_outcome.description: To compare these results in patients with/without Caesearean section in their medical history. Uterine hypertonus is diagnosed, when the number of uterine contractions is higher than 5 within 10 minutes (during pre-induction).

secondary_outcome.measure: The course of delivery (vaginally or Caesarean section)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From active phase of labor up to 1 day after delivery
secondary_outcome.description: To compare the rate of vaginal delivery/Caesarean sections in patients with/without Caesarean section in their medical history.
To compare these results in patients with/without Caesarean section in their medical history.
To compare the results in patients with/without caesarean section in their medical history. The rate of ceses with pH below 7,1.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 5 days from the birth
secondary_outcome.description: Clinical signs of infection are defined as follows: CRP levels > 8 mg/l Leukocyte count > 18 x 109/l Body temperature > 37.5°C

other_outcome.measure: Course of removal of Dilapan-S rods after pre-induction
other_outcome.time_frame: At the moment of removal of Dilapan-S rods after labor pre-induction phase up to 1 day after delivery
other_outcome.description: The evaluation of the course of removal of Dilapan-S after termination of preinduction by physician as very easy, easy, standard, with some complications or very complicated.

other_outcome.measure: Occurance of complication of rupture of fetal sac due to the use of Dilapan-S or other complications related to the use of Dilapan-S
other_outcome.time_frame: From Dilapan-S rods insertion up to 24 h of duration of labor pre-induction phase

other_outcome.measure: Patients´evaluation of pre-induction of labor with Dilapan-S
other_outcome.time_frame: From Dilapan-S insertion up to 24 h of duration of labor pre-induction phase
other_outcome.description: Subjective satisfaction Pain experienced during Dilapan-S insertion and pre-induction phase Quality of relax and sleep Frequency and intensity of uterine contractions during pre-induction

arm_group.description: 125 Patients with / without caesarean section in their medical history

intervention.description: Dilapan-S synthetic osmotic dilator for cervical ripening prior to labor induction

study_pop.textblock:
All patients indicated in the centres involved in data collection for pre-induction of labor with Dilapan-S who meet all inclusion and exclusion criteria.
In the above period, the Investigator will include consecutive patients in such a manner that the numbers of those with and without a history of Caesarean section be balanced.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Single pregnancy
- Pregnancy more than 36 weeks
- Vertex presentation of the fetus
- Cervix Score less than 4 points
Exclusion Criteria:
- Contraindication to vaginal delivery
- Pathological fetal station
- States after uterine body surgery - except for Caesarean section
- Clinical signs of uterine, vaginal or vulvar infection
- Fetus hypoxia (KTG recording evaluated as pathological prior to pre-induction initiation)
